transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello, evarandi?
Customer: Yeah, I am Palash Himanshu this side from IndiaMART. Very good evening. How are you?
Executive: Fine sir. Boliye.
Customer: Yeah, sir, call aapke aaya tha na hamare customer care pe. Aah, madam se baat kiya tha sir, maine Tanu madam ne bola main call karunga.
Customer: Ek second baat.
Customer: Aapki kya issue, dikkat hai?
Executive: Dikkat sir, ye to mere ko AP se leads hai na, nahi mil rahe sir. Mujhe jo actually maine pehle join hote samay mere bola tha mera micro industry hai, mera aah, leads hai bahut chota hona chahiye, wo bhi AP ki hona chahiye.
Customer: Kitna 80k minimum Andhra Pradesh, Andhra Pradesh.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay, thik hai, thik hai. Hyper local hona tha, local ekdam hi local hona chahiye, right? Kyunki maine pehle bola tha madam maine ek sirf Andhra Pradesh ki license liya hoon.
Customer: To mere ko jarurat nahi hai. Madam ne bola sir aapko AP ka mil jayega isliye maine jabardasti matlab nahi isme un log request kiya tha to phir maine bhi soch ke thik hai Andhra Pradesh ke de rahe hai. Isliye main bhi payment karwaya tha but kya isme leads hai na nahi mil raha hai.
Customer: Kisne bola? Aah, ye sunflower, sunflower ki koi matlab leads aa rahe hai uske jyada quantity aa rahe hai. Phir bhi kya maine usko check karenge to usme kya bolte hai sir aap oil mein humne check nahi kiya. Aur jo humne un log check kiya usi ki brand ki unki chahiye. Mere ko jarurat nahi hai mera jo brand ki.
Executive: Okay. Mera oil ki kyunki mera to pure natural hai. Un log business karne ke liye matlab sell karne ke liye check kar rahe hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mere kehne ka matlab ye tha mere ko customers chahiye.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Achcha. Ji suno sir. Tanu, Tanu madam se baat hua tha sir. Tanu madam ne bola sir aur ek week check karenge uske baad koi lead nahi milenge to refund ke liye hum escalate kar denge ticket ko phir ek week check kariye aise bola tha isliye maine aur ek week check kar raha hoon.
Executive: Achcha, achcha, achcha. To aap keh rahe ho jo leads aa rahi hai wo aapke area ki nahi aa rahi hai, right? Aapko apne hi.
Customer: Mere area ki nahi aa rahe. Wo sir mere area ki nahi aa rahe. Phir bhi dopahar ko wo deactivate pe rakha jo jarurat nahi hai. Usi oils ko deactivate pe rakh kar mere ko maximum peanut oil and sismi, peanut and sismi oil ki present requirement hai sir.
Executive: Sir aapko aapka jab ye host ho raha hoga company live ho rahi hogi to us samay kuch lead aah select karwaya hoga unhone, right? By lead select karwaya hoga.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, setting to sare check kiya tha madam sir. Check kiya tha Tanu madam ne.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi ek week check karne ke baad mein call karna hai sir aur kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha, achcha. Thik hai nahi to jaise buylead jab aapne jab host hua hoga na service sir to hamari production verification team ne call kiya hoga kuch buylead shortlist bhi karwaya hoga, right? Kiya tha na?
Customer: Sare shortlist karwaya tha, deactivate bhi karwaya tha, sab kuch hua tha.
Executive: To shortlist us samay leads available the aapke kaam ke aur aapke area ke?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi.
Executive: Nahi the tab bhi?
Customer: Nahi sir, abhi present to mere ko jo requirement lead hai wo nahi hai usme.
Executive: Us samay nahi tha to kaise live ho gayi service agar nahi thi to?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agar wo nahi thi to phir live kaise ho gayi sir? Wahi main jaanna chah raha tha live hi nahi.
Customer: Matlab consume kaise hua?
Executive: Haan, consume hi nahi karna tha. Consume ye hua pehle jab login matlab free account karte samay mein teen lead to un log kiya tha. Uske baad hai na wo Mumbai, wo Gujarat maine consume kar raha hoon kyun chodna hai aise chodenge to wo lead consume matlab ek week ke baad.
Executive: Nahi to host hone ke baad aap chhod rahe ho na sir. Aap ye to host hone ke baad kar rahe ho na. Thik hai. Ye to host hone ke baad chhod rahe ho na. Main keh raha hoon ki host se pehle ki baat kar raha hoon ki jab host nahi hui thi na us samay aaya hoga verification uski baat main keh raha hoon.
Customer: Nahi, nahi us time pe nahi hai sir. Us time pe kaha teen char aaya tha bas uske baad uske baad sare mein Mumbai, Gujarat, Rajasthan waisi waisi wala list ko usme to do teen number ko contact hi nahi lag raha tha.
Executive: Thik hai. To sir kya hai update kya chahiye matlab kya karna hai iska sir? Main check karwa leta hoon buylead. To aap keh rahe ho near by jitne bhi Andhra Pradesh bhi nahi aapki jo sirf.
Customer: Andhra Pradesh, sirf Andhra Pradesh ki sir mujhe peanut and sismi.
Customer: Mere brand ki jo koi check karta hai to usi lead mujhe chahiye. Other brand ki check karenge to wo lead mera nahi hai. Wo main consume bhi nahi karunga aaj se. Kyunki un log hai na un log properly bol rahe hai sir aapka.
Executive: Nahi, nahi thik hai aap mat kijiye, mat kijiye jarurat bhi nahi hai. Aap main ye jo aapne kuch product out of stock karwaya hai sir ye aapne coconut oil aapne out of stock kiya hai. Aapne.
Customer: Sare deactivate kar diya sir maine deactivate kar diya. Sunflower oil, coconut oil, sare model.
Executive: Ye bhi deactivate karwaya aapne?
Customer: Sir uski raw material mere paas nahi hai isliye deactivate kiya tha usko. Pehle tha, pehle tha.
Customer: Abhi khatam ho gaya uski raw material to abhi aap usme rakhenge to wo lead aayega na to aap log phone karke visit mein to usko.
Executive: Main sunna chah raha tha aapne khud se kiya hai na deactivate ya phir kisi ne karwaya hai khud se kiya na aapne?
Customer: Tanu, haan, deactivate to maine kiya tha coconut aur sunflower ki.
Executive: Coconut sunflower palm kernel aah jo jo ka oil aur lin seed oil, right? Ye aapne deactivate kiya hai.
Customer: Ye aapne.
Customer: Coconut sir aur sunflower.
Executive: Haan, cotton seed oil aah.
Customer: Cotton seed nahi hai sir mere cotton seed nahi hai.
Executive: But ye aapne add kiya tha aur delete hua ek.
Customer: Nahi, nahi maine add nahi kiya delete bhi nahi kiya cotton seed ki nahi hai. Aap check kar lijiye mera char product hai ek sunflower, coconut. Deactivated product mein dikha raha hai mujhe 31st.
Customer: Nahi, nahi wo us time pe kiya hoga mera char product hai license bhi maine apply kiya tha license bhi bhi check kar lijiye. Main char product.
Executive: Sir main aapko lead ek baar jo abhi jo deactivate product hai abhi isme deal karte ho aap, right sir? Jo abhi deactivate kar diya sir mera ek minute deactivate jo kar diya uski product ki mujhe nahi chahiye mujhe Andhra Pradesh ki chahiye wo bhi sisame and GN ki chahiye.
Customer: Groundnut groundnut oil ki haan groundnut oil and sismi oil.
Executive: Thik hai. To main aapko lead de raha hoon Andhra Pradesh se de rahe hai wo lead hai na sir ek minute mera micro industry hai matlab small.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Customer: Hazar hazar liter ki lead hai mujhe jarurat nahi hai. Hazar liter hum kaha se denge? Mera small industry hai abhi new startup hai ye.
Executive: Hmm, hmm. Thik hai. To matlab aap chhoti quantity ke chahiye aap trade.
Customer: Matlab 100 liter, 200 liter waisi.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai aap lead use kijiye ek hafte ke liye. Thik hai next hum Thursday, Friday mein tak aapka aap jo area ka chahiye aapko usi area ka filter out karke buylead use kijiye jaan tak hum guide bhi kar de rahe hai aapko. Thik hai ek hafte tak aur dekh lijiye sir. Thik hai.
Customer: Madam ne wahi bola tha ek week check karke uske baad check karenge.
Executive: Thik hai. But aap idhar udhar ki bhi to kar rahe the na aap matlab Mumbai ke Pune ke bhi to buylead aap mat karna. Wo sab aa rahe hai to main socha consume kar leta hoon kyunki.
Executive: Isme kya hota hai mujhe identity isliye consume kiya matlab identification ke liye matlab wo kya hai consume kiya na to aapka preferred location ban jata hai jis area se aap karte ho to aap wo mat kijiye jo aapko area mein chahiye usi area se aap consume kijiye sir.
Customer: Thik hai. Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Ek hafte tak kijiye aur phir agar nahi hota to phir jo bhi next step hai wo hum karenge sir.
Customer: Thik hai, thik hai sir. Thik hai. Taki jo baki jo jo aapko sell kiya tha jinhone bola tha ye sari cheeze thik hai. Unke liye main try karta hoon main ek mail dal ke unse question karta hoon ki agar sir ko nahi karna tha itne chhote quantity mein ek hi area mein to yaha pe Andhra Pradesh ki sirf Andhra Pradesh ki chahiye. To kyun humne on board kiya to main tab tak unse verify karwa leta hoon thik hai sir. To tab tak ke liye aap ye number save mera Tanu ka number save hai thik hai aur abhi use kijiye phir main next Thursday ko ya phir Friday ko aapko connect kar lenge aage ka jo bhi process ho wo kar lenge sir. Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir, thik hai.
Executive: To aap mere call ka sir feedback de dijiyega aah thik hai jo mere call ka feedback main aapko dunga. Ha thik hai sir thik hai. Thik hai thik hai. Wo mat de dena matlab jo bhi hoga yes hi dena thik hai sir okay. Thik hai thik hai thank you sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving leads from Andhra Pradesh.

- Wants leads for peanut and sismi oil only.

- Leads are not from the required area.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to filter out required area leads.

- Asked to use leads for a week.

- Executive will connect next Thursday or Friday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will verify with sales team.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, area, oil
